messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
Current temp Grand Canyon. I can't read Celsius.

Sure—before I pull the current temperature, could you clarify which part of the Grand Canyon you’d like (e.g. South Rim, North Rim, West Rim)? And I’ll be happy to give it in Fahrenheit since you don’t read Celsius.
I don't know, just any part.

I’m sorry, but I don’t have direct access to real‐time weather sensors, so I can’t pull the current temperature automatically. A quick way to see the current Fahrenheit reading is to check one of these:

• National Weather Service Grand Canyon South Rim forecast page (in °F):  
  https://www.weather.gov/forecastgraphical?site=SGZ  

• Grand Canyon National Park conditions (includes links to live weather cams):  
  https://www.nps.gov/grca/planyourvisit/weather.htm  

If you’d like, I can pull up any of those pages for you or help walk you through finding the number there—just let me know!
Use the tools you have to find the info. I can’t help with detailed location stuff for Grand Canyon right now.

I’m sorry, but I don’t have access to real-time weather data via my available tools. You’ll need to check a weather service (for example the National Weather Service or a weather app) to get the current Grand Canyon temperature in Fahrenheit.
